Class InstallPhantomJsMojo

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.klieber.phantomjs.locate.PhantomJsLocatorOptions, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="install",
      defaultPhase=PROCESS_TEST_SOURCES)
public class InstallPhantomJsMojo
extends AbstractPhantomJsMojo
implements com.github.klieber.phantomjs.locate.PhantomJsLocatorOptions
    Maven plugin for downloading and installing phantomjs binaries.
